Интересное продолжение 2 части. Больше выстрелов, больше приколов движка source, больше немоты от Гордона.

Garip bir oyun, aynı anda hem sıkıcı olup eğlenceli olmayı başarıyor denebilir. Bazı bölümlerde o kadar çok darlanıyorsunuz ki "artık nolur bitsin" diyorsunuz ama buna rağmen oyunu kapatmak istemiyorsunuz. Onun dışında eğlenceli de. Hikayenin devamı olarak düşünülürse basit ama çizgisinden çıkmamış bir seri oyunu diyebiliriz, ama tabii ki Half Life 1 ve Half Life 2 kadar detaylı olamıyor doğal olarak.

/i 3 saatlik bir oyun sürem gözüküyor ama yaklaşık 7 saatlik bir oyun sürem var. Oynarken internet bağlantım bir süreliğine kesik olduğu için 3 saat olarak gözüküyor ama oyunu bitirdim.

有意思，剧情推进得更精彩了，有些关卡被设计成了没有提示需要让玩家自己去摸索，最有意思的莫过于只开一枪就通关的设计，合理地利用环境互动和艾利克斯让游戏更具可玩性。

I can hardly criticise it, can I? It's everything you want from the Valve formula - incredibly easy to follow game design, a fascinating story and a perfect learning difficulty as the game goes on.

A review of this is almost redundant. It's as good as any other title in the franchise, and as difficult as I want it: very.

[b] 名称：半条命2：第一章 [/b]

本作是《半条命2》的独立资料片，剧情接续《半条命2》，讲述女主『爱丽克丝』与『弗里曼』博士在阻止反派BOSS的阴谋后逃出17号城的故事。作为资料片，画面细节较本体有所提升，关卡方面缩减了战斗部分的比重 而是将重点方面了解谜，流程大约只有5小时，算是体验本体过后的小小调剂。

[b] Tips： [/b]
·本作支持中文语音，但前提是必须额外安装2代本体。

·购买本作会赠送《半条命2：死亡竞赛》，该游戏为半条命2联机对战模式，不支持官方中文。

·有兴趣可参阅本人的2代本体评测：[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198167704316/recommended/220?snr=1_5_9__402/]

half life 2 episode 1 chyba raczej half life alyx, w kółko tylko o alyx cały czas za nami łazi i tak dalej. jeżeli chodzi o lvl to też są okropne, jakieś 50% gry to ciemne miejsca przy których bez latarki nie da sie chodzić, a latarka nie jest nieskończona. W episodzie 2 też jest pełno ciemnych miejsc ale w większości da sie wytrzymać bez latarki ( i alyx tam zdechła na troche czasu dlatego episod 2 lepszy). Dobrze zacząłem się bawic dopiero gdzies w ostatnią godzine gry, mówiąc o czasie gra jest mega krótka jeśli wiesz co masz robić. Jeżeli jesteś fanem hl musisz w to zagrać ale jeśli szukasz tylko jakiejś ciekawej strzelanki o wiele bardziej polecam half life 2 lub half life 2 ep 2

The first expansion for Half-Life 2 is not as good as the original or Episode 2, but that is like saying that McLaren is worse than a Ferrari or a Lamborghini.

EP1 is more horror oriented and features alot of dark places with only your flashlight or flares lighting your way, and well, ignited enemies aswell.

Overall this was a quite enjoyable 3.2 hour experience on hard, but the last 2 missions on the trainstation were quite painful.

Здравствуйте, мои дорогие любители классных игр. На днях я прошёл увлекательное продолжение к "Half-Life 2" и получил массу удовольствия. На этот раз Гордон Фримен должен будет пробиваться через толпы зомби и солдат Альянса вместе с Алекс по разрушенному Сити-17. Мы должны успеть до взрыва Цитадели, который погубит всё живое в городе.

Efsane FPS oyunu Half Life 2'nin devamı. Açıkçası Half Life 2'de bulamadığım hikaye açlığını yeteri kadar dindirdi. Oyunun neredeyse tamamında Alyx ile berarber takılıyoruz. Oynanış falan filan hep aynı. Bildiğiniz HL2 işte anlatmıştım bir daha aynısını mı yazayım ? Tek farkı biraz daha kısa ve hikaye odaklı olması. Tabiki yine bol aksiyon var ama hikaye HL2'ye göre daha fazla var. Bu kadar yani.

[h1]Half Life 2: Episode One[/h1]
[i]By: Lagana[/i]
This will be one of my shorter reviews so I’m sure your attention span will be very pleased. Half Life Episode One feels much like a stop game title to progress Half Life 2 to the story of Episode Two. Playing Episode One feels like fun filler with some great sections but maybe not worth fully replaying again. Surprisingly, Episode Two makes the events of Episode One seem a lot more important and meaningful but I’m reviewing this but itself and not as a whole. Not really much else to mention, the gameplay is the same loop of puzzles and combat(Zombine don’t really count as variation), characters are still written well but due to the setting of this episode don’t have much to do. With all this said I think Half-Life 2: Episode One is a 5/10. I think it serves as a nice extra expansion to Half-Life 2 but doesn’t change much in terms of narrative or gunplay which is a good thing. Not ever expansion has to be an innovative experience, some just need to stick with what works and this does. Well then, I’ll see you later. (I really wish there was an average option for Steam but I still recommend this for people who played Half-Life 2 to at least try it if they got in a bundle.)
Continues the saga. More please!
